page.description: Returns number of occurences of word in a list of words. Default delimiter is CRLF
page.syntax: Count as N = word_occurs(C list ,C word [,C delimiter ])

argument.name: list
argument.description: A CR-LF delimited list of words to examine. Character

argument.name: delimiter
argument.description: A character string that separates words. The default is the CR-LF character sequence.

page.discussion: WORD_OCCURS() returns the number of times Word appears in list. WORD_OCCURS() is not case sensitive.
